description:
A claim of a miracle take Hiraga and Roberto to America where they must solve the mystery behind a virgin conception but something else lies in wait.
Source: amazon

titles.title: Grâce à l`aide de Dieu, mes yeux sont ouverts
Omo no Sasae ni Yorite ga wa Mezameru
Through God`s Succor, My Eyes Are Opened
主の支えによりて我は目覚める
